name: Epson C51CB69010 LabelWorks LW-300 Label Maker

reviews.name: Epson C51CB69010 LabelWorks LW-300 Label Maker
reviews.reviewText: The label maker is pretty good. I've just begun using it, so I still have to refer to the user manual on a constant basis for understanding how to do certain functions on it. The refill tape though, is where they really stick it to you on the price.
reviews.title: Decent label maker

reviews.name: Epson C51CB69010 LabelWorks LW-300 Label Maker
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice label maker BUT there are no instructions that tell you how to increase the size of the print. Other than that it is much better than my old one of a different brand
reviews.title: 27 September 2012

reviews.name: Epson C51CB69010 LabelWorks LW-300 Label Maker
reviews.reviewText: I'm still exploring the uses for my new Label Printer. The Ribbons I printed made nice additions for my Christmas gifts this year. I have so many different ideas for gifts and more that I can use the printed ribbons. I am open to all kinds of ideas for labeling my hand made items to personalized ribbons for little girls hair. I just wish the ribbon cartridges were more readily available than having to order from Epson. I also like that I can use the label maker for iron on labels and labels for my home office all in one great labelmaker.
reviews.title: I recommend

reviews.name: Epson C51CB69010 LabelWorks LW-300 Label Maker
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, but after 1 hour of use and the batteries are depleted. Wish I would have read that it needed an adapter. Going to have to buy one asap.
reviews.title: LabelWorksâ„¢ LW-300 Label Printer

reviews.name: Epson C51CB69010 LabelWorks LW-300 Label Maker
reviews.reviewText:
Printing inconsistant, tape often "bunches up" and tangles where it exits the machine.

I do not recommend this unit.

Not worthy of the good Epson Name.
reviews.title: Epson LW300
